metadata.name: Headquarters
metadata.description:
‘Headquarters’ is a collaborative artwork created by Annibale Siconolfi and Ryan Koopmans.

Siconolfi's piece depicts an imaginative, futuristic city with both utopian and dystopian elements.

Koopmans' contribution is an architectural interior photograph that he and his partner Alice Wexell took in the country of Georgia, then implemented animated plants and light to create a surreal, overgrown space that overlooks Siconolfi’s city.

The exterior view from the room is Siconolfi's cityscape, designed in an architectural style that reflects the structural curvature and materials of Koopmans’ interior.

The artists' pieces were designed to complement and enhance each other aesthetically, as the themes found in their work align conceptually in a compelling way.
